snippet.title: Interactivity: The Interactive Experience - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Interactivity: The Interactive Experience is an exhibition by Aetheric Games, featuring The Button, out now on Steam and itch.io!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1166780/Interactivity_The_Interactive_Experience/
https://aethericgames.itch.io/interactivity-the-interactive-experience

In the world of "video-games", interaction engineers have spent years rigidly defining the specialised and determinate ways that you, a "video-game" protagonist, may interact with your world. Here in this guided tour you will find them all, glistening with promise, awaiting the click of your mouse and ready to edutain you! Please enjoy. Except for The Button. The Button is not for you.

Interactivity is a short meta-narrative experience that is equal parts of awkwardly-funny and oppressive. The original version released on itch.io in 2015 - this is an all new version, published on Steam by Pixeljam, and is completely remade with new art, secrets, endings, achievements and original music by Miles Tilmann of Pixeljam.

Trailer edited by Miles Tilmann.
